model

Class AllAccounts

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AllAccounts

  • public class AllAccounts
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Ashley Mains and Victor Gomes CLASS: AllAccounts DESCRIPTION: AllAccounts keeps track of all valid user information in a map of all User obejcts accessed by the String username.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AllAccounts(boolean doReadFiles)
      METHOD: AllAccounts() PURPOSE: Constructs and AllAccounts object that keeps track of valid user information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAccount(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, boolean isAdmin)
      METHOD: addAccount() PURPOSE: Adds a new user account to the map of all accounts.
      User getUser(java.lang.String username)
      METHOD: getUser() PURPOSE: Returns the User object and corresponding information under the given username.
      boolean isAdmin(java.lang.String username)
      METHOD: isAdmin() PURPOSE: Checks if the User under the given username is an admin or not.
      boolean removeAccount(java.lang.String username)
      METHOD: removeAccount() PURPOSE: Removes any valid user from the maps of users stored.
      void resetCounts()
      METHOD: resetCounts() PURPOSE: On a new day, reset all User's song selection counts to 0.
      boolean verifyAccount(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      METHOD: verifyAccount() PURPOSE: Checks the given a user's login information (username, password) if they are a valid User in this system (account is on file).
      void writeAccountsToFile()
      METHOD: writeAccountsToFile() PURPOSE: Writes out the current list of users to the file "AccountList".

        METHOD: AllAccounts() PURPOSE: Constructs and AllAccounts object that keeps track of valid user information.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        public User getUser(java.lang.String username)
        METHOD: getUser() PURPOSE: Returns the User object and corresponding information under the given username.
        Parameters:
        username - The String username to look up.
        Returns:
        The User under the given 'username'.

      • verifyAccount

        public boolean verifyAccount(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String password)
        METHOD: verifyAccount() PURPOSE: Checks the given a user's login information (username, password) if they are a valid User in this system (account is on file).
        Parameters:
        username - The String username of the account to verify.
        password - The String password of the matching account.
        Returns:
        True is the account has been verified; false if not valid.

      • isAdmin

        public boolean isAdmin(java.lang.String username)
        METHOD: isAdmin() PURPOSE: Checks if the User under the given username is an admin or not.
        Parameters:
        username - The String username of the account to verify.
        Returns:
        True if the account is an admin, otherwise false.

      • addAccount

        public void addAccount(java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       boolean isAdmin)
        METHOD: addAccount() PURPOSE: Adds a new user account to the map of all accounts.
        Parameters:
        username - The String username of the account to add.
        password - The String password to the matching account.
        isAdmin - The boolean flag whether the account is an admin or not.

      • removeAccount

        public boolean removeAccount(java.lang.String username)
        METHOD: removeAccount() PURPOSE: Removes any valid user from the maps of users stored. The system admin "Merlin" is not allowed to be deleted.
        Parameters:
        username - The String username of the account to remove.
        Returns:
        True if the account can be / has been removed, false if the account does not exist.

      • resetCounts

        public void resetCounts()
        METHOD: resetCounts() PURPOSE: On a new day, reset all User's song selection counts to 0.

      • writeAccountsToFile

        public void writeAccountsToFile()
        METHOD: writeAccountsToFile() PURPOSE: Writes out the current list of users to the file "AccountList".
